name: eldifeldifsn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, c1))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))))

stmt.origin: sselda(c2, cdif(c3, c1), cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, c1))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c3, c1), cdif(c3, csn(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, c1))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c3, c1), cdif(c3, csn(c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c3, c1), cdif(c3, csn(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(csn(c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, c1))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(csn(c0), c1))
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, c1))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))))

comment: An element of a difference set is an element of the difference with a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jan-2022.)
